name: StrategicShooter
description:
Welcome to my simple shooter game. You have to shoot targets with ammo, The targets give you materials which you can use to make more ammo. Be careful targets only give you the materials when you use the correct ammo. Click on the white crafting table to open the crafting menu, The goal is to go as long as possible without running out of ammo, so shoot carefully and wisely

Have FUN :D
